message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I can do $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I can do $98. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm not willing to give up on the price. How about we meet at $110, it's the best I can do?
